=====================
Basic Mekso
=====================

li pa
---
(source_file
  (mex (li) (number)))

=====================
Mekso with BOI
=====================

li re boi
---
(source_file
  (mex (li) (number) (boi)))

=====================
Mekso with operator
=====================

li pa su'i re
---
(source_file
  (mex (li) (number) (mex_operator) (number)))
